SELECT posi.`ID`, posi.`PARENT_ID`, posi.`CODE`, posi.`NAME`, posi.`CREATE_TIME`, posi.`UPDATE_TIME`, posi.`CREATE_USER`, posi.`UPDATE_USER`, create_user.ID CREATE_USER_ID, create_user.`USERNAME` CREATE_USER_NAME, update_user.ID UPDETE_USER_ID, update_user.`USERNAME` UPDATE_USER_NAME, COUNT(usr.ID) USER_COUNT FROM SYSTEM_POSITION posi LEFT JOIN `SYSTEM_POSITION_USER` spu ON spu.POSITION_ID = posi.ID LEFT JOIN `SYSTEM_USER` usr ON usr.ID = spu.USER_ID AND usr.DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN `SYSTEM_USER` create_user ON create_user.ID = posi.CREATE_USER LEFT JOIN `SYSTEM_USER` update_user ON update_user.ID = posi.UPDATE_USER
posi.DELETED = 0
AND posi.`NAME` LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%')
GROUP BY posi.`ID`
